gregi's log

my notes summarizing ml methods and articles

Blog About

Trellis Networks for Sequence Modelling (2018 Oct)

recurrent_networks  sequence_modeling 

New architecture for sequential modeling. Temporal convolutional network with weight tying which is equiavent to truncated recurrent networks.

MAML - Model-Agnostic Meta-Learning (2017 Mar)

meta-learning 

Train a model’s initial parameters such that the model has maximal performance on new task after only a few gradient updates by maximizing the sensitivity to the loss functions of new tasks.

PANet - Path Aggregation Network (2018 Mar)

instance_segmentation  object_detection 

Enhance feature hierarchy by bottom-up path augmentation, which shortens the information path between lower layers and topmost feature.

The Devil is in the Decoder (2017 Jul)

foundation  neural_net  semantic_segmentation  instance_edge_detection  human_keypoints  depth_prediction  colorization  super-resolution  gans 

Analyzing the upsampling layers inside the decoders.

Axial-Deeplab - Stand-Alone Axial-Attention for Panoptic Segmentation (2020 Mar)

image_classification  semantic_segmentation  transformers 

Fully attentional model for segmentation and image classification with factorizing 2D self-attention into two 1D self-attentions.

Visual Transformers - Token based image representation (2020 Jun)

semantic_segmentation  transformers 

Token based transformer for semantic segmentation.

GCNN - Guided Convolutional Neural Network (2019 Aug)

depth_completion  guided_convolution 

Depth prediction with guided convolution.

DETR - DEtection TRansformer (2020 May)

object_detection  transformers 

Transformer head for object detection set or prediction.
